name: The Mysterious Dimension
description:
This Game Was Made By Omar Alabdan Game Idea:

Try to manipulate your movement with the time to kill all the enemies and help your friend

Controls:

*WASD or Arrows to move

*Left Mouse Button to shoot

*The less you move the long you live

Story: The story has 2 Cutscenes : first Cutscene:

the first Cutscene shows your friend disappearing and you are tring to find him/her 

Second Cutscene:

im not gonna tell you what happen in the second Cutscene beat the boss and watch it it a suprise 

Enjoy.. :)
